Description: On I-264 at mile marker 8.7 in the City of Norfolk, near Campostella Road, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle crash. The east right center lane, right lane, right shoulder, and entrance ramp are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Crash

Description: On I-64 at mile marker 15.6 in the County of Alleghany, motorists can expect delays due to a vehicle fire. The east right lane and right shoulder are closed.
Label: Major Incident - Traffic - Vehicle Fire

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 172 in the County of Botetourt, motorists can expect delays due to a disabled vehicle. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Disabled Vehicle

Description: On I-81 at mile marker 17.7 in the County of Washington, motorists can expect delays due to a tractor trailer crash. The north right shoulder is closed.
Label: Minor Incident - Traffic - Tractor Trailer Crash
